author: Nicole Wetsman
title: US hospitals don’t have what they need to fight off COVID-19
description: The OIG at the Department of Health and Human Services interviewed hospital administrators and found that hospitals were struggling to get protective equipment and testing. Hospitals found the messaging from the federal government confusing.
content:
A report from the HHS oversight office shows how unprepared the health system is 
Photo by BRYAN R. SMITH/AFP via Getty Images
Hospitals in Cincinnati are furloughing and cutting hours for nurses and other health care workers. Nurses at a New York City hosp… [+4741 chars]
